Variable Documentation

Numerical Method
Initial value:
===============

HyPar solves the following partial differential equation (PDE) using a conservative finite-difference
algorithm on a Cartesian grid.
\f{equation}{
  \frac {\partial {\bf u}} {\partial t} = {\bf F}_{\rm hyp}\left({\bf u}\right) + {\bf F}_{\rm par}\left({\bf u}\right) + {\bf F}_{\rm sou}\left({\bf u}\right)
\f}
where \f${\bf F}_{\rm hyp}\f$ is the hyperbolic term

f $D f is the total number of spatial dimensions

the parabolic term is of the following and f $D f is the total number of spatial dimensions If the parabolic function is in this form
